bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket

components.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ hydroformed chainstay, cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger
Fox 32 FLOAT 29 Evolution CTD w/ 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 hollow Tech II w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano Deore XT, M781 SGS Shadow, 10-speed
Shimano SLX M678 front / M675 rear, 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Oval M250, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M613, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M600, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
